properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 b1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Jesus let Your kingdom come here
Let Your will be done here in us
Jesus there is no one greater
We need You more than ever
Show the world Your love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
King of heaven come down
King of heaven come now
Let Your glory reign
Shining like the day
King of heaven come
King of heaven rise up
Who can stand against us
You are strong to save in Your mighty name
King of heaven come

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are children of Your mercy
Rescued for Your glory
We cry Jesus
Set our hearts towards You
That ev'ry eye would see You lifted high

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
King of heaven come
(Sisters echo - King of heaven come)
King of heaven come
(sisters echo - King of heaven come)
King of heaven come
(sisters echo - King of heaven come)
Oh King of heaven come
